projects.name: EZY Skills
projects.desc: EZY Skills is an interactive EdTech frontend platform designed to guide beginners in IT career paths through a decision-tree chatbot and dynamic course catalog. It transforms complex learning data into clear, engaging, and production-ready user experiences.
features: Interactive decision-tree chatbot for personalized career guidance
Dynamic course catalog with category filters and detailed pages
Advanced course details with objectives, syllabus, and project showcases
Reusable and scalable component architecture for maintainability
Smooth animations and UX-focused transitions using Framer Motion and SCSS
Auto-scrolling conversations and interactive option cards
architecture: Feature-based folder structure: pages, components, shared logic
Separation of global UI components and feature-specific components
Optimized routing with React Router DOM
State management scalable via Redux Toolkit
design_system: Primary Colors: Orange (#F98149), Navy (#0E2C40), Royal Blue (#0148A9)
Interactive elements: hover effects, card elevations, smooth transitions
projects.goal: Empower beginners to explore IT career paths confidently while providing a scalable, interactive, and visually engaging learning platform.

projects.name: Cartopiaa
projects.desc: Cartopiaa is a modern, responsive e-commerce application built with React and Vite. It provides a premium user experience with smooth animations, intuitive navigation, dynamic product catalogs, and a fully functional cart and checkout system.
features: Homepage with Hero, Best Sellers, Featured Products, and scroll animations
Dynamic product catalog with filtering, sorting, and sidebars
Product details pages with image galleries, specifications, stock state, and related products slider
Fully functional cart with real-time calculations, delete confirmations, and hover animations
Favorites page to save preferred products
Checkout page with modern form-based order finalization
Chatbot AI assistant with dynamic questions loaded from JSON and container-only auto-scrolling
Reusable Skeleton loading system for pages and components
Scroll reveal animations across all major pages using Framer Motion
Responsive mobile-first design with adaptive Navbar & Footer
architecture: Component-based architecture with separation of concerns (Pages, Components, Contexts)
Lazy loading of all route components with React.lazy() and Suspense
Feature-based folder structure: pages, reusable UI components, product info components, sidebar filters, hero banners
Optimized routing with React Router DOM
State management via Context API for Cart, Favorites, Toast notifications, Theme toggle, and Confirmation modals
design_system: Custom SCSS styling with variables, nesting, and mixins
Hover effects, micro-animations, and scroll reveal transitions
Skeleton loading components for better perceived performance
Semantic HTML and ARIA attributes for accessibility
status: Homepage, Products, ProductInfo, Cart, Favorites, Checkout, and Chatbot pages completed
Performance optimizations using code splitting and lazy loading
SEO and additional performance fine-tuning pending
projects.goal: Demonstrate advanced React frontend skills by creating a production-ready, interactive, and responsive e-commerce platform with a focus on UX, performance, and maintainable code.

projects.name: Ahmed Portfolio Website
projects.desc: Ahmed's Professional Portfolio Website showcases modern web development skills, responsive design, animations, and interactive UI components. Built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and AOS, it highlights projects, skills, and contact information in a professional layout.
features: Fully responsive homepage with Hero, Skills (animated bars), Services, Why Me, and CTA sections
About page with Hero section, timeline for experience, education, and animated typing text
Projects page with responsive grid, project cards, hover effects, and AOS entrance animations
Project Detail pages with image gallery, Swiper carousel for other projects, and detailed project info
Contact page with info cards, dynamic contact form, FAQ section, and sidebar with services and social links
Back to Top button with smooth scroll and hover effects
Loading skeletons for pages and components to improve perceived performance
AOS scroll animations throughout pages with staggered delays for engaging UX
architecture: Feature-based folder structure: pages, components, shared logic
Reusable global components: Navbar, Footer, BackToTop, ImageGallery, Skeletons
Next.js file-based routing with optimized per-page code splitting
Responsive layouts using Tailwind CSS breakpoints (mobile â†’ 2xl)
design_system: Typography: Geist Sans and Geist Mono
Hover effects: scale, shadow, color transitions
Smooth entrance animations on scroll using AOS
Consistent padding, margins, and responsive grid layouts
status: All frontend pages completed: Home, About, Projects, Project Detail, Contact
Animations and hover effects fully implemented
Performance optimizations applied (lazy loading, CSS purge, image optimization)
SEO meta tags and accessibility considerations included
projects.goal: Showcase Ahmed's professional web development portfolio in a visually engaging, interactive, and fully responsive platform, demonstrating modern frontend skills, UX design, and project presentation.

name: Elite Gym
desc: Elite Gym is a professional, full-featured gym management platform built with Next.js. It enables gym owners and trainers to manage trainees, schedules, payments, and progress tracking through a modern dashboard with real-time data synchronization and AI-powered fitness assistance.
features: Role-based authentication for captains (trainers) and trainees
Comprehensive dashboard with real-time stats and activity feeds
Full trainee management (add, delete, image upload, validation)
Advanced schedule management system (Schedule Captain)
Payment plans UI with interactive selection and summaries
AI fitness assistant with multilingual voice input (EN / AR / FR)
Speech-to-text with auto RTL handling for Arabic
Real-time data sync using Appwrite backend
Dark-themed, responsive UI with animations and toast notifications
architecture: Next.js App Router with feature-based routing
Clear separation between dashboard, public pages, and auth flows
Reusable global UI components and dashboard-specific components
Context API for authentication and role-based state management
Backend-as-a-Service architecture using Appwrite (DB, Storage, Realtime)
design_system: Cards with gradients, hover states, and smooth transitions
status: AI assistant with voice input completed
Security hardening and real payments planned
goal: Deliver a scalable, production-ready gym management system that combines modern UI/UX, real-time backend services, and AI-powered assistance to streamline fitness center operations.
